message: I am a Jquery programmer primarily when using Javascript but recently been coding in the canvas a lot and heard Lime js is a good framework to use! It is built on the Google Closure framework for javascript and looks like it has a lot of functionality but when I searched around I couldn't find many articles or anything so just wondering if anyone thinks it's worth using?
closure is nice, but it is very different from jquery.  it's more object oriented and probably a little tougher to learn
It's more enterpris-y and probably not as quick to develop on for most people.
ie: gmail is written in closure.
closure is meant for large web applications, not at all the use case for jquery.
